hero.title: Transform Your Health with
hero.subtitle: Healthy never felt this good—let's make it your lifestyle. Discover personalized nutrition that transforms your energy, balances your hormones, and creates lasting habits backed by science.

features.title: What Makes My Coaching Different?
features.subtitle: Unlike generic diet plans, my approach integrates advanced nutritional science with personalized strategies that work harmoniously with your body's natural processes.

scienceBacked.title: Science-Backed Methods
scienceBacked.description: Every strategy is grounded in the latest scientific research and proven clinical evidence.

transformativeOutcomes.title: Transformative Outcomes
transformativeOutcomes.description: Achieve lasting results that endure—sustainable transformation, not short-term fixes.

tailoredCoaching.title: Tailored Coaching
tailoredCoaching.description: Customized guidance that adapts to your unique goals and lifestyle.

services.title: My Services
services.subtitle: Choose the level of support that fits your journey—from getting started to complete transformation with ongoing guidance.

kickstart.title: Kickstart
kickstart.subtitle: The beginning of your change
kickstart.description: Perfect for those who want to start without feeling overwhelmed.

lifestyle.title: Lifestyle
lifestyle.subtitle: Your new healthy routine
lifestyle.description: The most popular plan: balance between support and flexibility.

transform.title: Transform
transform.subtitle: Complete 360° support
transform.description: Designed for deep change with constant support.

benefits.title: What You'll Achieve
benefits.subtitle: These aren't just promises—they're the real transformations my clients experience when they commit to their wellness journey.

sustainedEnergy.title: Sustained Energy All Day
sustainedEnergy.description: No more afternoon crashes or energy dips. Fuel your body strategically for consistent vitality from morning to night.

restorativeSleep.title: Deep, Restorative Sleep
restorativeSleep.description: Wake up refreshed and ready. Optimize your evening routine and nutrient timing for quality sleep and faster recovery.

weightBalance.title: Effortless Weight Balance
weightBalance.description: Achieve your ideal weight without counting calories or feeling deprived. Build sustainable habits that work with your lifestyle.

peakPerformance.title: Peak Performance Mode
peakPerformance.description: Unlock your athletic potential with targeted fueling strategies that enhance strength, endurance, and recovery.

foodFreedom.title: Food Freedom & Joy
foodFreedom.description: Transform your relationship with food from stress to celebration. Enjoy meals without guilt or restriction.

lifelongVitality.title: Lifelong Vitality
lifelongVitality.description: Invest in your future self. Create lasting wellness habits that support your health, energy, and longevity for years to come.

testimonials.title: What My Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take my word for it. Here's what happens when you commit to a science-backed approach to wellness.

sarah.quote: Went from 3 cups of coffee daily to natural energy all day. Lost 15 pounds in 3 months!
sarah.author: Sarah M., 24

maria.quote: As a busy mom, I thought healthy eating was impossible. Isabel's meal prep strategies changed everything!
maria.author: María C., 26

roberto.quote: After my diabetes diagnosis, I was overwhelmed. Isabel made nutrition simple and sustainable - I feel amazing now!
roberto.author: Roberto S., 28

contact.title: Ready to Transform Your Life?
contact.subtitle: Be the next success story. Join others who've already transformed their energy, weight, and relationship with food. Your transformation starts with one decision.
